Article Title: “Little b*tch”: Brittany Mahomes slammed as “loser wife” in fiery rant by John Rocker over canceled celebrity fight
Article Text:
John Rocker calls Brittany Mahomes a loser wife (Image via Instagram)

John Rocker fumes over canceled bout with Patrick Mahomes Sr., blames “woke liberals”

Brittany and Patrick Mahomes reportedly stepped in to halt the fight

Former MLB pitcher John Rocker is once again in the spotlight, this time for launching a scathing attack on Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes and his wife, Brittany Mahomes . On April 18, Rocker took to social media platform X (formerly Twitter) to blame the couple for canceling a scheduled celebrity boxing match against Patrick Mahomes Sr., a former minor league pitcher and father of the NFL star.“Today is the day I was supposed to fight Pat Mahomes Sr.,” John Rocker wrote in a heated post. “Instead of fighting today he backed out like a little b*tch because his son and his loser wife decided it'd be a bad look to the family name for him to get in the ring. Bunch of f***ing woke liberals.”The match, originally announced by Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy, was part of the "Rough N Rowdy" boxing series and scheduled to take place in Wheeling, West Virginia. It stemmed from a staged altercation between Rocker and Mahomes Sr. on Bourbon Street during Super Bowl week, reportedly crafted as a publicity stunt to build hype around the fight.Court filings from Mahomes Sr.’s recent DWI case later confirmed the confrontation was orchestrated for entertainment purposes, with Mahomes Sr. standing to earn a minimum of $85,000 for his participation before the event was scrapped.Dave Portnoy weighed in on the cancellation during an episode of The Unnamed Show podcast, stating that Patrick Mahomes and Brittany played a pivotal role in putting a stop to the bout. According to Portnoy, “Mahomes' agent and Brittany – from what I am told – intervened and were like, ‘There's no way this fight’s happening. We’re going to cut this guy off if he does it.’”Neither Patrick nor Brittany Mahomes have responded to Rocker’s outburst. Instead, Brittany has been focused on family, recently sharing heartwarming photos from a Disney vacation with their three children—Sterling, Bronze, and Golden Raye.As the Chiefs look ahead to the 2025 NFL season, Mahomes is coming off a strong campaign with 3,928 passing yards and 26 touchdowns. Despite finishing the season with a 17-3 record, Kansas City fell short in Super Bowl LIX, losing to the Philadelphia Eagles.Also Read: Patrick Mahomes called ‘biggest loser’ as the Chiefs' face major issues on offensive line after Joe Thuney trade This latest clash between Rocker and the Mahomes family adds a bizarre offseason twist to the NFL drama, one that continues to blur the line between sports and spectacle.
Article Summary: Former mlb pitcher john rocker is once again in the spotlight, this time for launching a scathing attack on kansas city chiefs quarterback patrick mahomes and his wife, brittany. Rocker took to social media platform x (formerly twitter) to blame the couple for canceling a scheduled celebrity boxing match against mahomes sr.

Article Title: Is Taylor Swift too ‘white bread’ for Coachella’s cool crowd? Exploring the pop queen’s place in festival culture
Article Text:
Is Taylor Swift too mainstream for Coachella (Image via Getty Images)

Is Taylor Swift too mainstream for Coachella’s indie vibe?

When it comes to music festivals like Coachella, image matters just as much as the music. It’s not just about who performs—it’s about who belongs. So when Taylor Swift is rumored to make an appearance or even perform, one question keeps popping up: is Taylor Swift too “white bread” for Coachella’s trend-setting, genre-bending scene?On paper, Taylor Swift has the résumé to own any stage. With record-breaking albums, a sold-out Eras Tour, and a massive global fanbase, she’s arguably the biggest pop star on the planet. But Coachella is more than just a concert—it’s a cultural moment, curated for cool. It’s where edgy, experimental, and often underground artists get their shine. It’s where alternative fashion reigns and mainstream pop can sometimes feel… out of place.So why the “white bread” label? It stems from the perception that Taylor Swift’s music—despite its evolution—is still rooted in polished, safe storytelling. While she’s dabbled in indie folk with Folklore and Evermore, and even worked with edgy producers like Jack Antonoff and Aaron Dessner, some still see her as the girl-next-door in a world full of rebellious misfits.Yet that assumption overlooks her savvy reinventions. Taylor has consistently pushed boundaries in her own way—whether it’s re-recording her masters to reclaim her artistry, calling out industry sexism, or subtly weaving political themes into her music. She’s clean-cut, yes, but not without edge. Maybe she’s not flipping off the crowd in a studded leather jacket—but she’s rewriting the rules in a sparkly bodysuit, and doing it on her own terms.The reality is, Coachella has changed too. The lineup now spans everything from reggaeton and K-pop to hip-hop and house. The festival has become a melting pot of genres and identities. If Blink-182, Billie Eilish, and Bad Bunny can all share the same stage, why not Taylor?Also Read: Did Taylor Swift skip Coachella 2025 to avoid being upstaged by other stars? Fans question her absence amid rising speculation Whether she ever headlines or just shows up to support friends (like boyfriend Travis Kelce or producer pals), her presence sparks conversation. And maybe that’s the point. Because if Taylor Swift isn’t Coachella enough—then maybe it’s time to ask what Coachella really stands for in 2025.After all, being too “white bread” might just be the boldest thing you can be in a world obsessed with crust.
Article Summary: Is taylor swift too mainstream for coachella’s indie vibe? The festival has become a melting pot of genres and identities. If blink-182, billie eilish, and bad bunny can all share the same stage, why not taylor?

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shows off her son’s golf talent while cheering on her husband at the Masters Tournament
Article Text:
Paulina Gretzky has stayed away from the controversies Wayne Gretzky has faced.(Image via Getty Images)

Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, shows off her son’s talent as Vera Wang comments on it



Wayne Gretzky ’s older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has not associated herself with what her father went through in the last few months. As she maintained her silence, Paulina Gretzky has now been spotted supporting her husband, Dustin Johnson , at the Masters Tournament in Augusta and being with her children. Paulina Gretzky’s recent post is proof of that as she also shows off her son’s talent.Recently, Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, took to her social media to share a series of pictures from the Masters Tournament, where her husband, professional golfer Dustin Johnson, participated in.Paulina Gretzky posted pictures of walking alongside her husband as she carried his golf clubs for him. Dressed in a white jumpsuit, Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she added a green coloured cap.Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, also posted a video of their son Tatum trying his hands at what his father is known for. Tatum Johnson was spotted golfing as both his parents cheered him on because of his talent.Tatum Johnson was also spotted wearing a similar white jumpsuit like his mother as it carried his father’s name on the back.But it was just not his parents who cheered him on; famous fashion designer Vera Wang also dropped a comment on Paulina Gretzky’s post.Vera Wang’s comment read as, “Okay Okay. Gorg caddy. Young DJ in the making……,⛳️🏌”Wayne Gretzky was last spotted in public at the Chicago Blackhawks game, where he had arrived to see Alex Ovechkin tie his record. The NHL legend spoke highly of Alex Ovechkin and said, “I can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I’m not sure who’s gonna get more goals than that.”Wayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, “I was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved”.Since the, Wayne Gretzky has not appeared in public and is keeping a low profile. The NHL legend is yet to address the whole controversy surrounding him related to the 4 Nations' final match.Also Read: "F**k you Don Sweeney”: Brad Marchand’s 1100th NHL game sparks outrage among Boston Bruins fans
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has not associated herself with her father's controversies. She has now been spotted supporting her husband, dustin johnson, at the masters tournament in augusta and being with her children. The nhl legend is yet to address the controversy surrounding him related to the 4 nations' final match.

Article Title: La La Anthony makes candid admission on how she broke through hardship after divorce with Carmelo Anthony: "I don't mind it"
Article Text:
Image credit: Getty Images

La La Anthony was all praise for ex-husband Carmelo Anthony

La La Anthony on her divorce and being present for her son

La La Anthony on Hustle, Knowing Your Worth, and Being “Rich” | Richer Lives by SoFi

American TV personality, former MTV VJ, and former basketball player Carmelo Anthony ’s ex-wife, La La Anthony , has shared how her life changed after their divorce , despite being financially independent. She recently called Carmelo the “best dad” for always being there for their son. However, when speaking about herself, she said that she doesn’t have anyone to have her back. The two have been co-parenting their son, Kiyan Anthony , since their divorce.La La Anthony recently opened up about her work, life after divorce and her son during a chat with Vivian Tu on the show Richer Lives. The couple welcomed son Kiyan in 2007, got married in 2010 and got divorced in 2021. Despite being a successful TV personality and actor, La La opened up about losing her backing post her divorce with Carmelo Anthony.La La also didn’t mince words in praising her ex-husband when it came to what he does for their son. She said that she learnt to co-parent as they navigated the new space. “My son’s dad is the greatest dad I know and I am just so blessed that we have a child together. My son gets to experience having two incredible parents and having a dad like he does,” she said on the show. Kiyan has grown into a successful basketball player with a NIL valuation of $1 million.Opening her heart on how things changed after the divorce, she said, “You’re on your own at that point… and that puts a different responsibility, sometimes a different amount of pressure. Before, I was always financially independent, but in the back of my mind, I knew if anything happens, at least I have this person to help me or bail me out. You realise it’s just you. That just puts a different responsibility, sometimes a different amount of pressure. I am the person that everyone in my family calls. I don’t have anyone to call. There’s pressure there, but I don’t mind it.”La La has, however, held the fort well for the sake of her son and confirmed that she has always been present for his special moments. “For the most part, he can say that my mom’s always been there for all of my moments. Having a child automatically makes you realign your focus and your priorities. I schedule everything around my son. When I leave here, I’m going to Augusta because he has a basketball tournament,” she said.Also Read: Michael Jordan’s viral dance to Kendrick Lamar’s ‘Not like us’ makes waves, and Carmelo Anthony weighs in on the GOAT’s request La La started early as a MTV VJ and earned a name for herself even before becoming the so-called “first lady of NBA”. She said that she hustled even harder after marriage and has taught the same lessons to her son when it comes to knowing the value of hard work and money. She stressed on how she doesn’t let money drive her decisions and has taught the same thing to Kiyan when it comes to being associated with brand endorsements. Sharing the advice she gave to her son, she said, “Don’t be related to brands just for money, do things you are passionate about. It’s about your word and reputation.”
Article Summary: Carmelo anthony's ex-wife, la la anthony, opened up about her life after divorce. She said that she learnt to co-parent as they navigated the new space. The couple welcomed son kiyan in 2007, got married in 2010 and got divorced in 2021.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors could bag $166 million Miami Heat superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is congratulated by forward Draymond Green after making a 3-point basket during the second half of an NBA play-in tournament basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies in San Francisco, Tuesday, April 15, 2025. (Image via AP Photo/Jeff Chiu)

Golden State Warriors

Bam Adebayo

(Disclaimer: The information and analysis presented in this article are based on current speculations. While the details are sourced from credible insights, it’s important to note that these are not confirmed moves or official statements. Readers are encouraged to take this analysis with a grain of salt and stay tuned for official updates as the offseason unfolds.)

Why the Golden State Warriors Need to Move On from Buddy Hield

Bam Adebayo (Image via USA TODAY Sports)

"He’s looked more like a fraudulent splash brother as time has progressed."

Buddy Hield’s Decline in Key Stats

Month



3P%



Performance Trend



Early Season

December



30.5%

January



31.5%

Play-In Game

Bam Adebayo: The Ideal Frontcourt Upgrade

How Adebayo Fits with the Golden State Warriors

Thenarrowly escaped a Play-In disaster against the Memphis Grizzlies , securing the No. 7 seed in the Western Conference. But even with their postseason spot locked in, changes may be necessary this offseason—starting with moving on from Buddy Hield and pursuing Miami Heat star, as predicted by Caleb Hightower of Sporting News Buddy Hield’s early-season promise as a Klay Thompson replacement has faded. His three-point shooting, once reliable, has plummeted to concerning lows:- December: 30.5% from three- January: 31.5% from three- Play-In performance: 1-of-4 from deep against MemphisWhile Hield finished the regular season at 37.0% from beyond the arc, his inconsistency makes him a liability. As Caleb Hightower noted,If the Golden State Warriors exit the playoffs early, targeting Bam Adebayo in a trade could reshape their roster. The three-time All-Star has evolved into a complete two-way force:- 2024-25 Stats: 18.1 PPG, 9.6 RPG, 4.3 APG- Shooting Splits: 48.5% FG, 35.7% 3P- Versatility: Scores inside, handles the ball, and stretches the floorAdebayo’s growth from a defensive specialist to an offensive weapon addresses Golden State’s need for a dynamic big man.1. Scoring Boost: Provides interior scoring and mid-range efficiency.2. Playmaking: Adds a facilitator from the high post.3. Defensive Anchor: Complements Draymond Green’s versatility.The Trade ScenarioA Hield-Adebayo swap wouldn’t improve the Warriors’ outside shooting, but it would give them a proven All-Star to pair with Stephen Curry and Draymond Green. Miami, meanwhile, could benefit from Hield’s shooting if they retool their roster.Potential Trade Package- Warriors Receive: Bam Adebayo- Heat Receive: Buddy Hield, future draft picks, and/or young playersAlso read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles predicted to acquire 6-foot-8 Brooklyn Nets forward to form Big 3 with LeBron James and Luka Doncic Golden State’s playoff run will dictate their urgency, but pivoting from Hield to Adebayo makes sense. As Hightower’s analysis suggests, Bam Adebayo’s well-rounded game could be the missing piece for the Golden State Warriors’ next championship push .
Article Summary: Bam adebayo could be the missing piece for the golden state warriors’ next championship push. Buddy hield’s early-season promise as a klay thompson replacement has faded. The warriors could move on from hield and pursue the miami heat star.

Article Title: WrestleMania 41 live streaming, where and how to watch in US, UK, India, Saudi Arabia and more
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Streaming details: How to watch WrestleMania 41?

FULL SEGMENT: Seth Rollins STOMPS CM Punk and Roman Reigns as Heyman watches: Raw, April 14, 2025

Full streaming details with the timings

Full rundown of WrestleMania 41 card

Match card of WrestleMania 41

Also Read

As WWE WrestleMania 41 is just a few days away, WWE has recently revealed the full match card of the premium live event. As per reports, The Show of Shows will witness a total of 12 matches for two full nights at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada, from April 19, 2025, and continue till April 20, 2025.Out of the 12 confirmed matches, 5 matches have been confirmed for night one, April 19, 2025, while the other 7 matches will feature on April 20, 2025.The Show of Shows will witness some electrifying performances, intense feuds, and high-voltage drama that will go on in the history of WWE.The entire match card of WWE WrestleMania 41 has been revealed recently, from which it can be comprehended that the show is going to be very interesting in the coming weekends. Now, let’s take a quick look at the streaming details and timings of WrestleMania 41.As for the timing and streaming details, WrestleMania 41 will stream live on Peacock in the United States. The Show of Shows will emanate live at 7 PM ET/4 PM PT on both April 19 and April 20, 2025 originally in the United States, and Canada.However, in other parts of the world, WrestleMania 41 will be broadcast on Netflix and other prominent television channel networks. So, from the actual timing, the other timings and dates may differ a little. Here are the full streaming details with the timings for the Premium Live Event -In the United States, Alaska, Hawaii & Puerto Rico, the show can be watched live at 7 PM ET & 4 PM PT on Peacock. But, you must have their premium or premium-plus subscription to watch it. Internationally, it will be available on Netflix in most markets.-Fans in the UK and Ireland can watch WrestleMania 41 at 12 AM GMT on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-In Canada, the show will be broadcast live at 7 PM ET/4 PM PT on Netflix on 19 April 2025 and 20 April 2025.-In India, WWE WrestleMania 41 will be broadcast at 4:30 AM IST on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-Viewers in Saudi Arabia can watch the show at 2 AM AST on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-In Australia, the show will be broadcast at 10 AM AEDT/ 9 AM AEST only on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025 on Netflix.According to OTT giant Netflix, WrestleMania 41 will not stream on Netflix in the United States, but members in the following countries can tune in live on Netflix.These countries include: Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Ecuador, Egypt, Finland, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Indonesia, Israel, Kuwait, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, and United Kingdom.According to WWE , matches between LA Knight vs Jacob Fatu, Naomi vs Jade Cargill, and Rey Mysterio vs El Grande Americano are all scheduled for the first day on April 19. As per reports, these are the matches that will feature on day 1, along with the Triple-threat match between Reigns vs. Punk vs. Seth Rollins as the main event.Meanwhile, on day 2, matches like the Women’s triple-threat match, Intercontinental Championship, and the much-awaited Cody Rhodes vs. John Cena main event will be the highlight of the premium live event.This year's WrestleMania is stacked with thrilling matchups, but all eyes are on the triple threat clash featuring Roman Reigns, CM Punk, and Seth Rollins, as well as the WWE Undisputed Title match between John Cena and Cody Rhodes. Anticipation for these matches is sky-high, and one thing's for sure — history will be made in Las Vegas.
Article Summary: Wwe wrestlemania 41 is just a few days away. Wwe has revealed the full match card of the premium live event. The show of shows will witness a total of 12 matches for two full nights at allegiant stadium in las vegas, nevada, from april 19, 2025, and continue till april 20, 2025.

Article Title: Sonya Curry showers praise for Stephen Curry’s brother Seth Curry after his latest accolade: “I’m so proud of you”
Article Text:
Curry led the NBA with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second Hornets player to do so.

Sonya and Stephen Curry praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach Charles Lee applauded his leadership and work ethic.

praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Sonya Curry reacted to Seth Curry’s 3-Point percentage crown



Sonya Curry is a proud mother of two NBA stars— Stephen and Seth Curry. While Stephen Curry has made his name in the history of the league as one of the elite superstars, Seth Curry has also made waves in the scene playing for the Charlotte Hornets . Recently, Seth Curry has officially clinched the NBA’s three-point percentage title, capping off a season-long pursuit with the league’s most accurate shooting from beyond the arc. Sonya responded to her son’s latest accolade with a heartfelt note.As Seth Curry has secured the NBA’s three-point percentage crown, finishing the season as the league’s most efficient shooter from deep, his mother, Sonya Curry, reacted with a heartfelt gesture. “I’m so proud of you @sdotcurry ! You continue to excel and leave your mark on the NBA in your own way and in your own time! You have forged an impressive career through resilience and hard work! I love you!!!” Sonya wrote on Instagram.Seth Curry keeps showing steady improvement year after year. This time, he’s earned his first career NBA 3-point percentage title, becoming just the second player in Hornets history, alongside Glen Rice, to achieve the honor.His brother and the Golden State Warriors veteran, Stephen Curry also shared a congratulatory message. “Congratulations on leading the NBA this season in three-point percentage. Obviously, doing right by the Curry name.”Former NBA star and Seth's father Dell Curry was not keeping his thoughts on his son's achievements to himself. "Seth Curry, aka SDot. Well, what can I say other than I'm proud of you. Your're my son my golfing buddy, but most importently, my friend. So, congratulations Number 30," he said.“Obviously, it’s not something I think about coming into the year or even throughout the year,” Seth said. “I’ve been in the top five a lot of times in my career, but I’ve never finished the year No. 1. It’s a testament to consistent work ethic and being ready. It’s a great accomplishment, something me and my dad have now, and Steph does not have. Yeah, it means a little bit something,” he continued.This season, Seth hit a career-high 45.6% from beyond the arc, knocking down 83 of his 182 attempts.“I think I check my numbers maybe two or three times a year. I’m just going out there, playing the right way, trying to lead this group on and off the floor. If I’m open, be aggressive, make plays, knock down shots. If I’m not, swing it to the open guy. For me, it’s just going out there, playing simple basketball, making my open shots, creating for my teammates and creating space when I can, make it easier on them. Just try to give confidence to the group.”Reflecting on his journey through a challenging season, Seth shared how constant communication with the coaching staff kept him mentally locked in. “The constant communication with coach was good,” he said, explaining how he stayed prepared despite fluctuating minutes. “My adaptability and being able to come in with a rhythm… that’s important,” Curry noted. “Come in, make shots right away – that’s important,” he added.Also Read: “Basketball Gods smiled down” – Magic Johnson sends clear message about NBA playoff matchups for fans Hornets Head Coach Charles Lee also reacted to Seth’s latest milestone. “Very excited for Seth,” Lee said adding, “It’s cool for our organization, but even cooler for him. To achieve that after all the work he’s put in throughout his whole career, I’m very happy for him. I’m grateful for everything he’s given to our team as that veteran leader, but also kudos to our whole organization for investing in player development.”
Article Summary: Curry led the nba with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second hornets player to do so. Sonya and stephen curry praised seth for his resilience, while coach charles lee applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Article Title: Hollywood veteran Samuel L Jackson's wife shares bond with Michael Jordan's ex Juanita Vanoy in new Instagram post
Article Text:
Michael Jordan’s ex Juanita Vanoy (Image Credit: Getty Images)

Key Highlights

Michael Jordan ’s ex Juanita Vanoy stepped out to enjoy a Broadway play starring Hollywood veteran Samuel L. Jackson’s wife LaTanya Richard Jackson



’s ex stepped out to enjoy a Broadway play starring Hollywood veteran Samuel L. Jackson’s wife LaTanya Richard Jackson Juanita is associated with Broadway as she co-produced the 2022 production ‘Some Like It Hot.’



Juanita Vanoy separated from Michael Jordan in 2006 after a 17-year-long marriage



Hollywood veteran Samuel L Jackson’s wife finds an admirer in Michael Jordan’s ex Juanita Roy during her Broadway Play

Michael Jordan and Juanita Vanoy separated in 2006, ending their 17-year-long marriage

Hollywood veteran Samuel L. Jackson’s wife, LaTanya Richard Jackson, is friends with Michael Jordan’s ex-wife, Juanita Vanoy. Juanita stepped out on Thursday to enjoy a Broadway play, Purpose, in which LaTanya has starred. Juanita’s association with Broadway dates back to 2022, when she co-produced a comedy musical, ‘Some Like It Hot. Juanita is Michael Jordan’s ex-wife; the couple separated in 2006 after a 17-year marriage.Thursday was the night of entertainment and fun for Michael Jordan’s ex, Juanita Vanoy, as she stepped out to enjoy a Broadway family drama, Purpose. It was a sort of reunion for Broadway’s ex co-producer as she met her crew and the Purpose star LaTanya Richard Jackson, Hollywood star Samuel L Jackson ’s wife. Vanoy visited LaTanya backstage to bond over the play with her. They were accompanied by Vanoy’s crew, who happily posed for a group picture with the celebrities.LaTanya is a regular star on Broadway. She has acted in four Broadway plays so far, including "Joe Turner's Come and Gone," "A Raisin in the Sun," "To Kill a Mockingbird," and "The Piano Lesson." LaTanya directed "The Piano Lesson" and also acted in it.Michael Jordan and Juanita Vanoy married in 1989 at the White Little Chapel in Las Vegas in the middle of the night, as per People.com’s report. The couple’s relationship started turning sour due to Jordan’s demanding career. To make things better, Jordan decided to retire from basketball, but took a u-turn on his decision. Vanoy filed for divorce shortly after in 2002.According to various media reports, though they tried to reconcile, things went out of control, and they finally separated for good in 2006.Michael Jordan and Juanita Vanoy’s divorce was the most publicized development because of the hefty settlement money the former basketball star paid. Juanita’s net worth reportedly skyrocketed with the settlement amount, and she invested in businesses and co-produced the Broadway comedy musical Some Like It Hot.Also Read: NBA legend Michael Jordan revealed that it was infatuation at first sight with his ex-wife Juanita Vanoy Juanita Vanoy and LaTanya displayed adorable bonding in their latest meeting. What do you think about Juanita Vanoy’s backstage moment with LaTanya Jackson? Share in the comments.
Article Summary: Juanita vanoy is michael jordan’s ex-wife; the couple separated in 2006 after a 17-year marriage. Juanita is associated with broadway as she co-produced the 2022 production ‘some like it hot’ juanita stepped out on thursday to enjoy a broadway play, purpose, in which latanya has starred.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, RCB vs PBKS: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
RCB vs PBKS (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings produced an outstanding bowling effort, which laid the foundation for their five-wicket triumph over the Royal Challengers Bengaluru in a rain-affected IPL encounter.The match was reduced to 14 overs per side due to a rain delay, and the Royal Challengers Bengaluru could only muster a paltry total of 95 for 9.Tim David's unbeaten 50 off 26 balls accounted for more than 50% of RCB's inadequate score.Despite facing initial hiccups, the Punjab Kings chased down the target in 12.1 overs, scoring 98 for 5, and extending RCB's winless streak at home this season.The Kings' hard-hitting openers, Priyansh Arya and Prabhsimran Singh, struggled initially on a pitch that offered considerable bounce to the pacers.Arya, known for his ability to hit through the line, misjudged the conditions and skied a mistimed shot off Josh Hazlewood to David.Prabhsimran fell to Bhuvneshwar Kumar, and the Kings were jolted further when the in-form captain Shreyas Iyer was dismissed, edging Hazlewood to the wicketkeeper.With the score at 53 for 4, the Kings found themselves in a precarious position, but Nehal Wadhera's composed innings of 33 not out off 19 balls, including a couple of sixes off Suyash Sharma, steadied the ship.Wadhera's calm approach played a crucial role as the Punjab Kings eventually crossed the line, boosting their tally to 10 points and moving up to second place on the points table behind the leaders Delhi Capitals.Earlier, the Kings' clever bowling restricted RCB to a disappointing total after Shreyas opted to bowl first. The decision proved fruitful as the bowlers claimed three wickets in the powerplay.Phil Salt perished in the first over, trying to hit Arshdeep Singh out of the park, while Virat Kohli and Liam Livingstone also departed without making a significant impact.Yuzvendra Chahal, making his return to his former IPL home ground, Chinnaswamy Stadium, had a memorable outing, claiming the wicket of Jitesh Sharma. Rajat Patidar played some handsome shots, including a six off Bartlett, but RCB suffered a setback when Patidar (23 off 18) was dismissed by Chahal's tossed-up delivery.Marco Jansen (2/10) used short-pitched balls effectively, dismissing Krunal Pandya and Manoj Bhandage, as the RCB innings unravelled.Despite a few big blows by Player of the Match Tim David, including three consecutive sixes off Harpreet Brar, who also claimed two wickets, RCB's total proved insufficient against the Kings' disciplined bowling effort.
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat royal challengers bengaluru by five wickets. Match was reduced to 14 overs per side due to a rain delay. Tim david's unbeaten 50 accounted for more than 50% of rcb's inadequate score. Punjab kings chased down the target in 12.1 overs, scoring 98 for 5.

Article Title: Luka Doncic is willing to "go to war" for Play-Off success - Can he lead the Los Angeles Lakers to the 2025 NBA Championship?
Article Text:
Luka Doncic (Image via Getty)

Luka Doncic

Los Angeles Lakers

“I think we have a great team. We have guys who are willing to go to war. Everybody is staying together, the chemistry is high. So I think we, for sure, have a chance.”

has been determined to win the Championship title, and he has been highly vocal regarding this in a recent interview. Thehave entered the 2025 NBA playoffs as the No. 3 seed in the Western Conference, setting up a first-round matchup against the Minnesota Timberwolves. Central to the Los Angeles Lakers’ renewed championship aspirations is their superstar acquisition, Luka Doncic, who has dramatically transformed the team since joining midseason.Since Luka Doncic’s arrival, the Los Angeles Lakers have posted an 18-10 record when he’s on the court, a 64.2% winning percentage that underscores his immediate impact. Averaging 28.2 points, 8.1 rebounds, and 7.5 assists per game in 28 outings with Los Angeles, Doncic has brought elite-level production and playmaking to a team that had been searching for a consistent offensive leader.Luka Doncic recently showed confidence in his team by saying,His presence alongside LeBron James and rising star Austin Reaves has created a potent trio, bolstered by a solid supporting cast and high team chemistry. Luka Doncic’s playoff pedigree is well established. Just last year, he led the Dallas Mavericks to the NBA Finals despite battling significant injuries, showcasing his ability to elevate his game under pressure. Now healthier and more integrated with the Los Angeles Lakers, Doncic is eager to embrace the challenges of postseason basketball with his new team. He has expressed confidence in the Lakers’ championship potential, emphasizing the team’s unity and willingness to “go to war” together. His career playoff scoring average of 30.9 points per game ranks second only to Michael Jordan, highlighting his capacity to deliver in critical moments.The upcoming series against the Timberwolves promises to be a compelling battle, especially with Doncic’s anticipated matchup against Rudy Gobert, a defensive stalwart and multiple-time Defensive Player of the Year. Doncic thrives in pick-and-roll situations and relishes the opportunity to test his skills against Gobert, which could prove decisive in the series.Despite some skepticism from outside voices, including former champions predicting a disappointing playoff run, the Los Angeles Lakers and their fans are buoyed by the optimism of their star player and coaching staff. Head coach JJ Redick has voiced strong confidence in Doncic’s abilities, noting that no defender can truly contain him. The Lakers’ recent form—19-12 since Doncic’s arrival—combined with the veteran leadership of LeBron James and the dynamic scoring of Doncic, positions them as a formidable contender.Also read: Los Angeles Lakers in Trouble? Magic Johnson reveals his biggest concern involving Anthony Edwards Threat - "I'm scared for my Lakers!" In sum, the Lakers’ 2025 playoff outlook is bright, fueled by Luka Doncic’s exceptional talent and the team’s cohesive chemistry. While the path to the championship will be challenging, the blend of experience, skill, and hunger for success makes the Los Angeles Lakers a legitimate threat to claim their 18th NBA title this season. The stage is set for a thrilling postseason, with Doncic poised to lead Los Angeles on a deep playoff run.
Article Summary: Luka doncic has been determined to win the championship title with the los angeles lakers. The lakers have posted an 18-10 record when he’s on the court, a 64.2% winning percentage. Averaging 28.2 points, 8.1 rebounds, and 7.5 assists per game in 28 outings with los angeles, doncic has brought elite-level production and playmaking to the team.

Article Title: After 'too slow' sledging incident, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Mitchell Starc's post-match chatter goes viral – Watch
Article Text:
Mitchell Starc and Yashasvi Jaiswal (PTI/AP Photos)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think sledging adds to the excitement of cricket? No, it should be avoided Yes, it makes the game more thrilling

Bombay Sport Exchange EP 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: In the aftermath of a thrilling IPL 2025 clash between Delhi Capitals and Rajasthan Royals , the spotlight wasn't just on the Super Over drama , but also on a heartwarming post-match exchange between two of the game’s fiercest competitors: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Mitchell Starc The two were at the centre of a now-viral sledging moment during the India-Australia Test series in the last Border-Gavaskar Trophy, where Jaiswal cheekily told Starc, “It’s coming too slow,” after defending a back-of-length delivery.Also See: SRH vs MI The comment, caught on stump mic, drew laughs and sparked light-hearted chatter among fans, with Starc later revealing he hadn’t even heard it in real-time.That tension, however, seemed to have melted away during Wednesday night’s IPL thriller at the Arun Jaitley Stadium.After Starc's superb final over helped push the match into a Super Over, which Delhi eventually won, cameras caught Jaiswal and Starc embracing with smiles and sharing a few friendly words.Jaiswal was heard asking, “Are you having fun in Delhi?” to which Starc, with a grin, responded, “We have been here for five days.”Watch:The moment was a stark contrast to their fiery exchanges in whites, showing how quickly camaraderie can resurface in franchise cricket.With Starc’s calm under pressure helping DC clinch a Super Over win and Jaiswal’s steady form keeping RR in the fight, both players continue to make headlines this time, for all the right reasons.It’s just another reminder that while cricket is a battle on the field, respect always finds its way through.
Article Summary: Yashasvi jaiswal and mitchell starc were at the centre of a now-viral sledging moment during the india-australia test series in the last border-gavaskar trophy. That tension, however, seemed to have melted away during wednesday night’s ipl thriller at the arun jaitley stadium.

Article Title: Tom Brady hints at betrayal and ‘willful blindness’ as Gisele Bündchen gets closer to her new baby daddy
Article Text:
Tom Brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele Bündchen (Image via Getty Images)

From gridiron greatness to emotional vulnerability



When public image collides with private battles



Even the most successful athletes face challenges that stats and accolades can’t capture—and Tom Brady is no exception. Widely regarded as the greatest quarterback in NFL history , Brady's legendary career boasts an unmatched seven Super Bowl titles, yet behind the shine of championship rings lies a more vulnerable, human side he’s beginning to share with the world.For two decades, Tom Brady maintained a laser focus on football, becoming the ultimate symbol of discipline and competitive excellence. But recently, the 46-year-old has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele Bündchen . Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak, admitting he’s dealt with moments of “willful blindness.”This phrase—suggesting a conscious decision to ignore uncomfortable truths—points to the complexities Tom Brady faced in his marriage’s unraveling. While he didn’t name names, the context was unmistakable, especially given recent headlines surrounding Bündchen's ongoing relationship with her jiu-jitsu trainer, who is now widely rumored to be her partner and the father figure in her children’s lives.“Willful blindness” is not just a phrase—it’s a powerful acknowledgment of emotional compromise. Brady’s reflection reveals the cost of chasing perfection on the field while personal issues simmer in the background. The quarterback, once seemingly invincible both in his career and family life, now speaks like someone reckoning with the pain of being left behind. For fans, it’s a rare and raw admission: the GOAT is still just a man.The emotional fallout of watching Bündchen move on publicly is undoubtedly difficult for someone so accustomed to control and success. Reports of her being seen with her new partner and children add emotional weight to Brady’s recent comments, suggesting a sense of betrayal or at least loss.Also Read: Fresh discussion on Tom Brady and Gisele’s Bündchen’s marriage reignites debate over missed red flags Tom Brady’s recent openness signals a shift—not just for him but for the culture surrounding sports icons. His words serve as a reminder that personal pain doesn't discriminate by fame or fortune. As he transitions into the next chapter of his life, his legacy will now also include emotional authenticity—proof that true greatness isn't only measured by rings, but by the willingness to confront what hurts behind closed doors.
Article Summary: Tom brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel gisele bündchen. Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya calls this player Mumbai Indians' 'gun fielder'
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya (BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange EP 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

Poll Who do you think was the standout performer for Mumbai in their recent victory over SRH? Other players Deepak Chahar Hardik Pandya Will Jacks

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians skipper Hardik Pandya credited his bowlers for effectively using variations and executing plans smartly on a sluggish wicket, as his side secured a four-wicket win over Sunrisers Hyderabad in their IPL match at the Wankhede Stadium on Thursday.MI restricted SRH to 162 for five and chased down the target with 11 balls to spare, finishing at 166 for six in 18.1 overs."I think the way we bowled today was very smart and spot on. We stuck to simple basic plans. Certain balls were not easy to hit. Credit to the bowlers that we made them hit some good shots. We were kind of squeezing them," Pandya said at the post-match presentation.The MI captain noted that the pitch offered some early assistance, which the bowlers capitalised on."If you look at it, had a nice green grass look to it. The first couple of overs that Deepak (Chahar) bowled, couple of balls got stuck in. We decided to use change of pace balls. As soon as we figured out, we trying to mixing it up."We executed the yorkers very smartly well." Will Jacks was the standout performer for Mumbai, returning impressive figures of 2/14 before scoring a brisk 36 off 26 balls to help his team notch their second straight win of the season."That is the beauty of Jacks. He can be a gun fielder. Bowl those gun overs. Today it came off for him."When we needed 42 off 42, it was tricky. We wanted to take our time."Meanwhile, SRH captain Pat Cummins admitted his side fell short of a competitive total on a challenging surface."It wasn't the easiest wicket. Few runs short, we would have liked a couple more with the bat. Tricky wicket, when you come here you expect it to be really fluent and fast, just wasn't that," he said.MI bowlers were clinical as they kept the SRH batting line-up in check, not allowing them to break free at any stage of the innings."They bowled really well, shut down a lot of our hitting areas. I thought we had all our bases covered, with 160 you feel like you are a little bit short," Cummins added."We gave it a good crack with the ball. We thought we needed wickets, we had plenty of death bowling, we knew the impact player would bowl 1-2 overs that's why we went with Rahul."For SRH, it was their fifth loss in seven games this season."You have got to play well away from home to make the final, unfortunately it hasn't clicked so far this season, we have a short break and we go again," he said."Every game we talk about assessing, the boys did well to get through the powerplay and there wasn't reckless hitting, next game is at home and we know that venue pretty well."
Article Summary: Mi restricted srh to 162 for five and chased down the target with 11 balls to spare. Will jacks was the standout performer for mumbai, returning impressive figures of 2/14 before scoring a brisk 36 off 26 balls to help his team notch their second straight win of the season.

Article Title: “Basketball Gods smiled down” – Magic Johnson sends clear message about NBA playoff matchups for fans
Article Text:
Magic Johnson shares his excitement for NBA Play-off games. Image via: Rob Tringali/ Getty Images

The Hall of Famer’s message has added major buzz, calling this year’s playoff slate “exactly what the league needed.”

Warriors, Magic, Heat, and Mavericks clinched final spots in a dramatic Play-In finish.

Eight matchups promise high-stakes drama, with fierce rivalries and title hopes on the line.

Magic Johnson shared a message ahead of the Play-off matchups

NBA Playoff picture. Image via: NBA.com

Saturday, April 19, kicks off with four Game 1 matchups, including:

Excitement among basketball fans is sky high as the NBA playoff matchups are getting closer. Ahead of the mega basketball event, Los Angeles Lakers legend Magic Johnson has sent a message to fans to tune into the games. Johnson has been actively following the recent games, and his excitement and endorsement for the upcoming event have sparked a huge interest among fans.Hall of Famer Magic Johnson has recently taken to his X account to share his excitement for the upcoming NBA playoff games. “The basketball Gods smiled down on the NBA with these great Playoff matchups with teams that are fierce rivals,” Johnson wrote on the platform.“This is exactly what the league needed. All basketball fans should definitely tune in!” he added.The 2025 NBA Play-offs are off to a thrilling start as the Golden State Warriors and Orlando Magic clinched the No. 7 seeds through the Play-In Tournament. Golden State will now battle the surging Houston Rockets, while Orlando prepares for a tough test against the defending champion Boston Celtics. On Wednesday, the Miami Heat knocked out the Chicago Bulls, and the Dallas Mavericks ended the Sacramento Kings' hopes, completing the postseason bracket. The NBA’s most exciting stretch is here. It appears that the first round could run through May 4 before the Finals tip off on June 5.-Pacers vs. Bucks at 1 p.m. ET on ESPN/fubo-Nuggets vs. Clippers at 3:30 p.m. ET on ESPN/fubo-Knicks vs. Pistons at 6 p.m. ET on ESPN/fubo-Lakers vs. Timberwolves at 8:30 p.m. ET on ABC/fuboSunday's action will see the debut of the Celtics-Magic and Rockets-Warriors series. Time and broadcast details for these games will be confirmed soon.Also Read: “A trade that attracted a lot of attention” – Did Adam Silver just admit Luka Doncic’s trade increased NBA viewership? The full playoff calendar is packed with games nearly every night. The NBA Finals tip off on June 5. Until then, the chase for the Larry O'Brien Trophy is officially underway.
Article Summary: Magic johnson shares his excitement for nba play-off games. Hall of famer calls this year’s playoff slate “exactly what the league needed” warriors, magic, heat, and mavericks clinched final spots in a dramatic play-in finish. Eight matchups promise high-stakes drama, with fierce rivalries on the line.

Article Title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle spent a calm day hours before the star player earned another accolade
Article Text:
Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, enjoyed a day with her friends, hours before the star player’s team faced a devastating loss



Image via Lauren Kyle/Instagram

Connor McDavid ’s wife, Lauren Kyle, has been a huge source of strength for the Edmonton Oilers’ star player. The captain of the Edmonton Oilers came back to the ice last week to play against the St. Louis Blues after being unavailable for a couple of weeks due to an injury he had sustained on 20th March at the match against the Winnipeg Jets. Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle took to her Instagram as she celebrated a day with her friends.Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle, reposted a story of her friend’s as the two hung out with each other. While the two were not there in the picture, Lauren Kyle’s friend thanked her for hosting her.The picture posted by Lauren Kyle’s friend shows a table full of delicacies as Lauren Kyle is seen pouring a drink for her friend. The caption of the picture reads as, “The hostest with the mostest @laurenkyle”Lauren Kyle also added the words, “Sunday Spritz” to her Instagram story and it seems like the two friends had a relaxing weekend as they hung out together. But there is no sign of Connor McDavid on Lauren Kyle’s story.Just a few hours ago, the NHL announced Connor McDavid to be the Second Star of the Week and fans are here for it.The star player’s team, the Edmonton Oilers, took to their social media to celebrate Connor McDavid’s achievement with the caption that read as, “🤩 SECOND STAR 🤩 With nine points in three games in his return to the lineup, #Oilers captain Connor McDavid is the @NHL's Second Star of the Week!”While things had greatly improved for the team when Connor McDavid returned to the ice to face the St. Louis Blues, the Edmonton Oilers faced a devastating loss against the Los Angeles Kings a few hours back.This was the Edmonton Oilers first loss after Connor McDavid returned on 9th April. Coincidentally, at the last match against the Los Angeles Kings on 5th April, the Edmonton Oilers had again faced a loss.The Edmonton Oilers ended the final game of the regular season with a win against the San Jose Sharks as Connor McDavid scored his 100th goal at the match. His wife, Lauren Kyle, is yet to react to his achievements.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shows up for her husband as eyes remain on her legendary father
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid’s wife, lauren kyle, took to her instagram as she celebrated a day with her friends. The edmonton oilers faced a devastating loss against the los angeles kings a few hours back. Connor mcdavid scored his 100th goal at the match against the san jose sharks.

Article Title: History made! RCB captain Rajat Patidar breaks Sachin Tendulkar's record in IPL
Article Text:
Rajat Patidar (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Do you think RCB can bounce back in their next match against Punjab Kings? Depends on the players' form. No, they're struggling. Yes, definitely!

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings secured a five-wicket win over Royal Challengers Bengaluru in a rain-curtailed Indian Premier League encounter on Friday. The match, delayed due to evening showers, was reduced to 14 overs per side.Batting first, Tim David played a counter-attacking knock of 50 off 26 balls, guiding RCB to 95 for nine. Josh Hazlewood starred with the ball for RCB, returning impressive figures of 3/14, but his effort couldn’t prevent PBKS from cruising to the target in just 12.1 overs. Nehal Wadhera top-scored for Punjab with a brisk 33 off 19 deliveries.Despite the loss, RCB skipper Rajat Patidar reached a personal milestone, becoming the second-fastest Indian to score 1000 runs in IPL history.He achieved the feat in just 30 innings, second only to Gujarat Titans’ Sai Sudharsan, who took 25 innings. In doing so, Patidar surpassed the likes of Sachin Tendulkar and Ruturaj Gaikwad (both 31 innings), and Tilak Varma (33 innings).Notably, Patidar also became the first Indian batter in IPL history to reach 1000 runs with an average above 35 and a strike rate exceeding 150.Following the result, RCB slipped to fourth in the points table with four wins and three losses from seven games.Punjab Kings, meanwhile, climbed to the second spot with 10 points, registering their fifth win in seven matches.RCB will face Punjab Kings again in their reverse fixture in Mullanpur on Sunday.
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat royal challengers bengaluru by five wickets. Rain-curtailed match reduced to 14 overs per side. Rcb skipper rajat patidar becomes second-fastest indian to score 1000 runs in ipl history.

Article Title: Gregg Popovich health update: Fan favorite San Antonio Spurs coach suffers scare in restaurant
Article Text:
Gregg Popovich. Alex Slitz/Getty Images

Gregg Popovich suffers medical scare at San Antonio restaurant, now home and recovering.

suffers medical scare at San Antonio restaurant, now home and recovering. The incident occurred months after Popovich’s mild stroke sidelined him for the 2024–25 NBA season.

Spurs remain silent on Popovich’s condition, but sources confirm he’s stable and doing well.

San Antonio Spurs

Gregg Popovich

Gregg Popovich suffers restaurant scare months after stroke



Gregg Popovich. Image via: Jesse D. Garrabrant/NBAE via Getty Images

head coach, one of the most respected figures in NBA history, experienced another health scare this week, months after suffering a mild stroke. According to TMZ and later confirmed by multiple outlets, the 76-year-old coach had a medical incident while dining at a local San Antonio restaurant on Tuesday night. The incident involving the NBA legend sparked concerns among fans.Emergency responders were called after someone reportedly fainted at the restaurant. TMZ obtained footage of Gregg Popovich being wheeled out on a stretcher and placed into an ambulance. While the team has remained quiet about the incident, sources close to the situation confirmed to the Associated Press that Popovich was taken to the hospital and is now back home, stable, and doing well.Popovich has not publicly addressed the situation, and the Spurs have chosen not to issue an official statement. GMSA anchor RJ Marquez provided a key update, writing, “The Spurs do not plan to release an official statement or comment on Coach Gregg Popovich. Pop had a medical incident at a local restaurant on Tuesday night, but is home and doing well. Best wishes to coach.”This incident comes just five months after Popovich suffered a mild stroke on November 2 at the Frost Bank Center. The stroke occurred a day before a scheduled game against the Minnesota Timberwolves. The franchise announced the news nearly two weeks later, stating he was expected to make a full recovery. “At this point, a timeline for his return to the sidelines has not been determined,” the Spurs said in a statement on November 13.Popovich, who had been away from coaching duties since the stroke, officially confirmed in late February that he would not return for the remainder of the 2024–25 season. In a heartfelt message, he praised his staff and players during his absence. “I’ve decided not to return to the sidelines this season,” Popovich said in a February 27 statement. “Mitch Johnson and his staff have done a wonderful job and the resolve and professionalism the players have shown, sticking together during a challenging season, has been outstanding. I will continue to focus on my health with the hope that I can return to coaching in the future.”While fans and media alike continue to speculate about his future with the team, there is still no official word on whether Popovich will return to coach for the 2025–26 NBA season. ESPN’s Shams Charania echoed the updates, noting that Popovich is currently “home, stable and doing fine.”Also Read: Sonya Curry showers praise for Stephen Curry’s brother Seth Curry after his latest accolade: “I’m so proud of you” For now, Coach Pop is resting and focusing on recovery, and the basketball world continues to send well-wishes to a coaching icon.
Article Summary: Gregg popovich had a medical incident while dining at a local san antonio restaurant on tuesday night. Emergency responders were called after someone reportedly fainted at the restaurant. Popovich was taken to the hospital and is now back home, stable, and doing well. This incident comes just five months after popovich suffered a mild stroke.

Article Title: Ukrainian tennis player Tsurenko sues WTA and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress''
Article Text:
Ukrainian tennis player Tsurenko sues WTA and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress''

NEW YORK: Ukrainian tennis player Lesia Tsurenko has filed an amended lawsuit that accuses the WTA Tour and its chairman, Steve Simon , of a breach of contract, negligence and the "negligent infliction of emotional distress" because of the way it has handled Russian and Belarusian players amid the war in Ukraine. Tsurenko, who was once among the world's top 25, claims in the lawsuit that WTA executives - including Simon, who was its CEO at the time - failed to follow through on assurances made in a meeting with Ukrainian players that the organization would ban Russian or Belarussian players who publicly supported the war with Ukraine.The amended lawsuit, filed Tuesday in federal court for the Southern District of New York, cited examples such as Russian player Veronika Kudermetova wearing a patch at the French Open for sponsor Taneft, a subsidiary of a company that was sanctioned by the European Union for helping to supply the Russian army."Despite this promise," the lawsuit from Tsurenko claims, "neither Defendant Steve Simon nor Defendant WTA banned Russian and Belarus players who publicly supported the war."The WTA said in a statement to The Associated Press on Wednesday that it has been "steadfast and clear in its condemnation of Russia's war on Ukraine and the actions of the Russian government against the Ukrainian people.""Consistent with our position," the statement said, "the WTA has taken numerous steps to assist our Ukrainian player members, who have faced great challenges as professional athletes. The WTA has been equally clear that it was founded on principles of equality and non-discrimination and its rules provide that competitions are open to all women players who qualify based on their merit, and without discrimination. Consistent with those principles, and in common with other tennis organizations, the WTA has taken the position that individual athletes should not be penalized for the actions of their governments."Shortly after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022, the WTA Tour, ATP Tour and International Tennis Federation issued a joint statement in which it said Russian and Belarusian athletes would be allowed to compete as long as they did not compete under their nation's flags. That policy remains in place with Russian and Belarusian athletes competing at last year's Paris Olympics as "Individual Neutral Athletes;" Russian players Mirra Andreeva and Diana Shnaider won silver in women's doubles.Tsurenko's lawsuit states that she was forced to withdraw from an event at Indian Wells because of a panic attack from having to potentially play against Russians and Belarusians, and that she had "developed excessive stress, loss of concentration affecting her performance at tennis games, mortification and injury to her feelings."Lindsay Brandon, the WTA director of safeguarding, informed Tsurenko in 2023 that Simon would be investigated for violating its code of conduct. But that October, the organization informed her that Simon had not violated its code nor any provision of the employee handbook. Tsurenko tried to appeal but was unsuccessful."Even in my worst nightmares, I couldn't imagine that the professional tour, which I considered my home, would become a terrifying and alien place, where the (former) CEO of the organization consciously committed an act of moral abuse against me, leading to a panic attack and my inability to do my job," Tsurenko wrote Tuesday on social media.The initial complaint filed in November requests a trial by jury.Proskaeur Rose, the law firm representing the WTA, filed a motion last month to dismiss the case on the grounds that Tsurenko's claims were "legally defective." The WTA has until April 30 to decide whether it will continue with its motion to dismiss."While the WTA has the greatest sympathy for the significant challenges that Ms. Tsurenko and our other Ukrainian athletes have faced," its statement said Wednesday, "we are disappointed that she has decided to engage in litigation to seek to hold the WTA responsible for her distress. At all times, the WTA and its management acted appropriately and in accordance with our rules, and we are confident that we will prevail in this litigation."
Article Summary: Ukrainian tennis player lesia tsurenko sues wta and its chairman for causing ''emotional distress'' wta says in a statement that it has been "steadfast and clear in its condemnation of russia's war on ukraine" the wta has until april 30 to decide whether it will continue with its motion to dismiss.
